articles.title: Every Homeland Security officer in Minneapolis is now being issued a body-worn camera, Noem says
articles.description:
The news of the body cameras comes as Minneapolis has been the site of intense scrutiny over the conduct of federal officers after two U.S. citizens protesting immigration enforcement activities in the city were shot and killed.

The post Every Homeland Security officer in Minneapolis is now being issued a body-worn camera, Noem says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Homeland Security officers in Minneapolis will now wear body cameras to increase accountability.
This decision follows the fatal shootings of two U.S. citizens during immigration protests.
Boston residents may see similar measures implemented to enhance transparency in local law enforcement.

articles.title: We can’t wait to watch these movies and TV shows in 2026
articles.description:
A look ahead at the biggest TV premieres and movie releases slated for 2026.

The post We can’t wait to watch these movies and TV shows in 2026 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston residents can anticipate major TV premieres and movie releases in 2026.
Several highly anticipated titles include sequels and adaptations from popular franchises.
Local theaters may see increased attendance and revenue from these releases.

articles.title: Report: Patriots owner Robert Kraft not selected for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame class
articles.description:
Kraft, eligible since 2013, was a first-time finalist this year but reportedly fell short of the 40 votes he needed.

The post Report: Patriots owner Robert Kraft not selected for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame class appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots owner Robert Kraft was not selected for the 2026 Hall of Fame class.
Kraft, eligible since 2013, was a first-time finalist but lacked 40 necessary votes.
This decision impacts local fans' recognition of Kraft's contributions to the Patriots.

articles.title: Forget the refs. Bruins only have themselves to blame after collapse in Tampa.
articles.description:
"It's just kind of looking ourselves in the mirror, I think. It's been an issue all year."

The post Forget the refs. Bruins only have themselves to blame after collapse in Tampa. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins lost to Tampa Bay Lightning, highlighting self-inflicted issues this season.
Players acknowledged recurring problems, emphasizing accountability after multiple game collapses.
Local fans express frustration over team's performance ahead of upcoming home games.

articles.title: How NFL commissioner Roger Goodell reacted to reported Bill Belichick Hall of Fame snub
articles.description:
"We don’t participate in the voting process. I want to make sure that the question doesn’t lead people to that conclusion."

The post How NFL commissioner Roger Goodell reacted to reported Bill Belichick Hall of Fame snub appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell addressed Bill Belichick's Hall of Fame snub on February 3, 2026.
Goodell clarified that the NFL does not participate in the Hall of Fame voting process.
Belichick's potential snub may affect local fans' perceptions of his legacy in Boston.
